repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:12.04
MAINTAINER Star Brilliant <m13253@hotmail.com>

RUN apt-get -y update && \
    apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install curl expect-dev python sudo && \
    cd /opt && \
    curl -f -C - -L -s https://github.com/ossrs/srs/archive/2.0release.tar.gz | tar xzv && \
    cd srs-2.0release/trunk && \
    ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && \
    make && \
    rm -rf 3rdparty doc && \
    apt-get -y clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

EXPOSE 1935 1985 8080
COPY srs.conf /opt/srs-2.0release/trunk/conf/docker.conf
COPY entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
